mapper.insert: insert into oa_sys.changedepartmentbyteacher(uid, releaseUid, departmentUid, changeReason, nextUid) values (#{uid}, #{releaseUid}, #{departmentUid}, #{changeReason}, #{nextUid})
mapper.select: select count(*) from oa_sys.changedepartmentbyteacher where releaseUid = #{releaseUid} and status = 0
select uid, departmentUid, changeReason, status, count, nextUid, create_time, update_time from changedepartmentbyteacher where releaseUid = #{releaseUid} and status >= 0
select uid, releaseUid, departmentUid, changeReason, status, count, nextUid, create_time, update_time from changedepartmentbyteacher where uid = #{uid} order by update_time desc
mapper.update: update changedepartmentbyteacher set status = -1, update_time=now() where uid = #{uid}
